pageProps.content: [["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic 内置了多种信息图模板，可在",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/gallery","children":"示例"}],"页面直接试用，快速生成成品。"]}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":["使用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-templates","children":"getTemplates"}]," 获取完整模板列表，或通过 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-template","children":"getTemplate"}]," 按 ID 获取配置。"]}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":["若需自定义，可结合 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#register-template","children":"registerTemplate"}]," 注册自己的模板。"]}]]}]]
pageProps.contentEn: [["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic has multiple built-in infographic templates that can be tried directly on the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/gallery","children":"Gallery"}]," page to quickly generate finished products."]}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Use ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-templates","children":"getTemplates"}]," to get the complete template list, or get configuration by ID through ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#get-template","children":"getTemplate"}],"."]}],"\n",["$r","p",null,{"children":["If you need customization, you can register your own templates with ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-exports#register-template","children":"registerTemplate"}],"."]}]]}]]
